name: Othercell
storyline: The game is set in 2024, and starts in a city(fictional) in California named Blue Haven. You play as Adam, a police officer who, a year prior to the events of the game, lost his parents to a terrorist attack in one of the biggest malls of the city. He's now trying to get his life together to help his younger brother, Scott. But one day, something unexpected happens...
summary: Othercell is a story-heavy RPG inspired by the 90s title like Final Fantasy and Resident Evil. Othercell will allow you to play as Adam Brandt, a police officer who got caught in a strange and dangerous situation in his hometown. "Link" with your enemies to survive and build strong teams to defeat the toughest foes!
